edu.wpi.disco

Class Interaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.wpi.disco.Interaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleInteraction

    public class Interaction
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class for managing a turn-based collaborative discourse interaction between two actors. Note that this class is basically symmetric between the two actors. Furthermore, multiple instances of this class involving overlapping actors can be created (see NWayInteraction).

    Interaction with the "environment" is typically handled by scripts associated with tasks.

    NB: Only methods in this class documented as thread-safe may be used in a multi-threaded environment. Also see thread-safe methods of Actor.

      • Interaction

        public Interaction(Actor system,
           Actor external,
           java.lang.String from)
        Create an interaction with a console for debugging. Note this creates a new instance of Disco for this interaction.
        Parameters:
        from - url or filename from which to read console commands (for testing), or null
        See Also:
        Interaction(Actor,Actor)

      • Interaction

        public Interaction(Actor system,
           Actor external)
        Create an interaction and associated discourse model between given actors. Note this creates a new instance of Disco for this interaction.
        Parameters:
        system - - actor which is modeled as external=false in task model
        external - - actor which is modeled as external=true in task model

      • done

        public void done(boolean external,
        Task occurrence,
        Plan contributes)
        Thread-safe method to notify interaction that given task has occurred. Typically used in dialogue loop.
        Parameters:
        external - true if performed by user, false if by system
        occurrence - task that has occurred
        contributes - plan to which this task contributes, or null
        See Also:
        doneUtterance(Utterance,Plan,String)

      • doneUtterance

        public void doneUtterance(Utterance utterance,
                 Plan contributes,
                 java.lang.String formatted)
        Variant of done(boolean,Task,Plan), used in choose(List,int,String), to notify interaction that given utterance has occurred. Thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        formatted - corresponding formatted string, or null

      • doneSilent

        public Plan doneSilent(boolean external,
              Task occurrence,
              Plan contributes)
        Variant of done(boolean,Task,Plan), used in NWayInteraction, that does not print to console. Thread-safe.

      • doTurn

        public boolean doTurn(boolean first)
        Perform one turn of interaction.
        Parameters:
        first - true if this is first turn
        Returns:
        true iff interaction should continue running

      • start

        public void start(boolean externalFloor)
        Start the interaction with specified actor's turn. Runs on separate thread.
        Parameters:
        externalFloor - true iff user gets floor first.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear any discourse state information stored in this interaction.

        Completely replace the instance of Disco used by this interaction.

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Stop this interaction thread.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Method to cleanup (free resources, etc.) when this interaction thread exits. Calls cleanup on two actors.
